Text: what format are these sound clips? my files say (mp3) but they wont play.. neither can they be converted by total audio converter...what am i doing wrong? are they for an audio program?

The mp3's play, there are files that are very small in size, bytes, they don't play. I don't know why they are there, sorry, I just copied everything that was given to me.
